column5: Our charming Craftsman home was built in 1915 and is only one block north of historic San Pedro Springs Park. It has been lovingly updated to provide guests with a comfortable, convenient place from which to explore this vibrant city. Only minutes from the Riverwalk, Convention Center, the Pearl, access to I-35 and I-10, you are sure to be able to get wherever you're going quickly and easily. Popular local restaurants and other venues are also nearby.
column8: Spacious Private Room, Studio, Bath, and Entrance
